Chapter 5: Rose and her Human
by: (10)
More by this author • Gift a Paid Membership
(Chapter carried over from Steven Universe slob/wg/gts)

Rose Quartz was always fascinated by the humans and their way of life. The way they ran about with their busy schedules, stopping at fast food resturaunts as they darted around Beach City. She was even more fascinated by their slow shapeshifting. Her dear husband, Greg, had grown slightly larger around the midsection since she first met Mr. Universe. She noted that over time, her love for him increased along with his weight, so perhaps size in human culture is equated with love?

It was a cool spring afternoon as Greg and Rose sat contentedly on a towel on the beach. Greg was enjoying his favorite snack, a hot dog, while snuggling up with his much larger wife.

"Why do you enjoy hot dogs, Greg?" Rose inquired. Greg was caught off guard for a moment before responding.

"Well, uh, I guess I'm not sure. They're convenient and tasty I guess."

"And do they make you larger?" Greg blushed at the question. Was he getting fat? He decided to not to worry too much about the implications of the question.

"I suppose I have gained a little bit of weight, yeah." Rose smiled and hugged her lover tighter.

"That's good to know, thank you, Greg." Rose held her husband and began to imagine all the ways she could make him love her more.

---

The hot summer sun bore down on Greg as he made the finishing touches on the mayor's truck. The vehicle glittered in the sun as the water began to dry. It had been a month since Greg saw Rose. She told him that she had an important mission with the Crystal Gems to fulfill, but Greg was worried and missed his wife. After the mayor came and picked up his truck, Greg went to his office and noticed a note.

"Dearest Greg,

Come to the temple, I have a surprise for you.

Your loving wife,
Rose"

Greg blushed as he imagined what the surprise could be. He closed the car wash early and rushed to the temple to see his wife. He climbed the steps and noted a very... distinct... odor coming from inside the house.

Greg was positively shocked as he stepped inside. Rose Quartz sat naked on the couch, easily three times as big as she was when Greg had last seen her. She had always been large, but she now stood a foot taller than before and was substantially wider. Her stomach was segmented into numerous folds while her enormous ass took up most of the couch. The summer heat caused her body to glisten with sweat. Clutched in her hand was a hot dog, and next to her was a pile of the things. Greg blushed deeply at the sight of his wife.

"Mr. Universe, come to me and see what your surprise is."

1143322122321.content:
“I’m really glad you agreed to see me again, Jacqueline,” Morty said with his usual hesitant stutter.

“Of course, sweetie, I’ve missed you,” the tall redhead replied as she tried to avoid snagging her dress on anything. “I was…I was actually kinda surprised to hear from you though, after…all…that,” she continued, waving her finger around.

“Yeah…” Morty gave a little embarrassed laugh, “That…that was a mess last time.” Morty pushed a wide leaf out of the way. “And that’s why I wanted to see you again, kind of make it up to you or something.”

Beyond the leaf lay a small clearing in the brush, but it was obvious it was not anywhere on Earth. The sky above was a shade of green with a small pair of suns hanging high overhead. The plants were also unlike anything that Jacqueline had seen before, all different shades and shapes that she didn’t even know could exist.

“I’m surprised your grandfather let you bring me out here,” she said walking past him and into the clearing. She stretched her arms up over her head and made sure to lean forward a bit to stick her rump back at Morty.

Y-ye-yeah, he’s…he’s great…like…that,” Morty stammered, rubbing the back of his neck.

Despite Morty’s obvious lie, Jacqueline didn’t mind, she was just happy to see Morty again even if he wasn’t quite the same as he was before.

Soon enough, they had a typical looking picnic setup going: the square cloth laid out on the ground and the basket of food waiting close by. Morty was looking a bit distraught though.

“Something wrong, Morty?”

“Aw jeeze, I forgot to pack something. I’m gonna have to go back and get it. You wait right here and I’ll be back as quick as I can.”

Without even waiting for a response, the young man darted off, jumping through a portal leaving Jacqueline alone. Several minutes passed with no sign of Morty returning. After continuing to wait for a while longer, the redhead got up, dusted her slinky black dress off, and wandered around the edge of the clearing. A breeze rustled the leaves…and bringing a curious scent to Jacqueline’s nose. She furrowed her brow and followed the scent back to where it came. It led out of the clearing, away from where they had come in though. She furrowed her brow and sucked her teeth for a moment before another waft of the scent made her shove a few plants aside and slipping into the gap.

The “path” they had walked before had allowed some sunlight to seep through, but on this side there wasn’t enough to keep her from running into things as she continued to push through. As she was about to turn back, she came to a shaded clearing. In the center was a large plant, tendrils spreading across the dark ground. The centerpiece though was an enormous flower bud. As she got closer, Jacqueline could tell that the smell she had been following was coming from the flower. Something twinged in her brain, making her think about returning to the picnic and waiting for Morty, but the larger part of her mind forced her closer.

With a yelp, she fell forward, her foot catching on an unseen loop from the plant. She fell into the bud, feeling it quiver beneath her touch. With a quiet hiss, the bud started to unfurl. She looked down at the vibrant glowing interior of the plant for a moment before a cloud of something that may have been pollen shot out of the flour straight at her. She hacked and coughed as she tried to breathe air that wasn’t filled with the thick cloud, waving her hands around and trying to rub her stinging burning eyes.

After several seconds of torture, she was able to see again…somewhat. Breathing was still painful, but not as bad as it had been. The pollen clung to her skin despite wiping off of her dress easily. Any on her skin though smeared around no matter how hard she scrubbed. She was starting to feel warm though, hot in fact. After a further few seconds, she realized it wasn’t just her temperature; she was getting more than a little aroused from all the rubbing. She even started to grope her curves in an attempt to solve the predicament, but it only made her lust worse without any outlet.

She was panting and moaning with her eyes still streaming and stinging when the snap of a branch made her freeze in place. “Morty, is that you?” she managed to gasp out. “I know I shouldn’t have taken off, but…” her voice caught in her throat as something moved into the clearing, and it was certainly not Morty.
1143322122321.title: Into the woods

choices: …lying in a bed in a luxurious bedroom.
…curled up on a cot in a prison cell.
11433221223211.content:
Stepping out of the brush was a fox with black fur. Not unheard of, but still somewhat odd. Odder by far was the fact that this fox was walking around on two legs, covered in what looked like futuristic knight armor, and carrying what could only be a weapon of some sort, the wide barrel pointing straight at Jacqueline. The creature barked something at her, but the redhead couldn’t make heads or tails of it. She tried to say something back, but her lungs betrayed her, spasming and making her fall to all fours with a racking cough. As if coming from a distance, the creature barked something even harsher sounding, but she was in no position to respond. What she could see still started swimming and blurring further before she slumped to the side and blackness consumed her.

Jacqueline woke up with a groan, reaching up to hold her aching head. Or at least she tried to; something stopping her before she could even start. At least she wasn’t feeling so hot and aroused now; the pain spread throughout her body wasn’t a welcome trade though. Cracking her eyes open, she found that she could see a bit better than before, but what she was looking at didn’t make much sense. Her mind slowly ground up to speed and she realized that she wasn’t in the alien forest any longer. Rather than the odd plants and sky above, stark metallic looking walls with soft recessed lighting surrounded her. Craning her head down, Jacqueline saw that she was lying on a bed of some sort and her arm was being held by a circular band connected to the bed. Glancing down the other side, she saw that her other arm was similarly held as were her legs.

The sound of nearby voices made her freeze. Glancing around, she saw the fox warrior thing through a window set in the wall across the room. The fox was in an obvious state of agitation, all bared teeth and sharp gestures. Seated behind the desk the fox was standing at was a cow as humanoid as the fox was. Rather than the stern face and armored body though, the cow looked far more maternal and even– dare she say – a bit regal. Her – because there was little doubt of that – curvaceous body was clad in a long piece of clothing that wasn’t quite, but close enough to a doctor’s coat that the redhead wouldn’t have bet against her assumption about the cow’s position. The bovine weathered the fox’s abuse without batting an eyelash, but then held up a hand, causing the fox’s fur to bristle even further. With a jolt, Jacqueline realized the cow was looking right back at her. Jumping into motion, she tried in vain to pull her limbs free of the restraints, but despite not being tight in the least, she couldn’t slip out at all.

Before she could try anything else, both of the creatures were standing over her. The fox continued emitting a stream of harsh sounds, but the cow didn’t pay the other any attention, her gaze was focused on the human restrained between them. She said something sounding much nicer towards Jacqueline, but she made as much sense as the other despite the difference in tone. The redhead tried to reply, but a sudden coughing fit prevented the attempt. She was somewhat aware of the cow snapping something at the fox, which finally shut the other up for a bit, before something was placed at Jacqueline’s mouth. Liquid flooded into her mouth and down her throat despite the coughs, bringing blessed relief. It was somewhat sweet, but that was all she could recognize of the otherwise unfamiliar taste. The embrace of unconsciousness reached for her again, but it wasn’t nearly as foreboding as it had been before for some reason.

When next she awoke, Jacqueline felt better. She wasn’t back to one hundred percent, but at least most of the aching was banished away. She almost drifted back to sleep, but something made her decide against that, opening her eyes and taking in her surroundings. It didn’t take more than a moment’s glance to figure that she wasn’t in the medical lab or whatever that place was. Instead she was…
11433221223211.title: Not in Kansas anymore

114332212232111.content:
Silky sheets that felt like clouds made substantial all but flowed through her fingers. The walls were a soft tan color and were a far cry from the bare metal walls she had seen before. Slipping out of the bed aggravated a dull ache within her skull, so Jacqueline had to pause for a moment with her eyes shut again. When the pain subsided, she got up and wandered around the room. She found it somewhat familiar but alien at the same time. One of the “walls” faded away like mist at sunrise, revealing a window overlooking a bustling city in the distance. What looked to be cars flew through the air between needle-like spires that pierced the sky. Despite everything that had happened to her, Jacqueline couldn’t help but feel a bit of awe at knowing that she was on an alien world with other sentient life.

She turned away from the window though, as getting distracted by the view wasn’t going to help her. If she could find that clearing again, she might be able to find Morty and get back home. Short of that, maybe she could find some way to contact him to come get her. A civilization this advanced has to have some way to communicate, right? the redhead thought.

There were two doors leading from the bedroom. Flipping a mental coin, she headed for the left one. She frowned when she saw that there was no door handle or hole or anything to open it. Her concern turned to surprise when the door slid aside without a touch as she approached it. She tried stepping back and the door slipped back into place without a sound.

Stepping through, she found herself in what had to be the main living area. Plush looking chairs were set around a low table to one side, while the other direction held a sunken seating area arrayed something circular in the center. Another window spread along the wall beyond the sunken seats, showing a panoramic view of the city as well as dark mountains and what appeared to be a glittering purple sea bordering the city between.

Grumbling somewhat, Jacqueline turned her attention to the trio of other doors leading off of this room. One opened to reveal something somewhat familiar looking as a kitchen, though she couldn’t quite tell what some of the appliances were. The thought of some food after her failed lunch was appealing, but she shook her head and moved on, she could eat when she got back to Earth or at least figured out some way out of here. The second door opened into a small yet cozy dining area, and—judging from the matching doors in there and the kitchen– was connected directly to the room next door.

The third door was past the chairs in the main room. Unlike the other though, this one made a sound when Jacqueline approached. It bleated out a short double tone that sounded very close to the classic negative noise to her ears . The stubborn metal refused to shift aside as well. She couldn’t even worm her fingers let alone her nails between door and frame to try forcing it apart. Pounding on it and shouted yielded no result but a throbbing ache in her hand and a resumed flair up of the pain in her head.

Staggering back through her apparent prison, she returned to the bedroom, and the door she had skipped over before. Steadying herself on the wall, she paused for a moment before getting close enough for the door to open. Looking around, she had little doubt that she was now in the bathroom judging from the sunken bath looking area in the middle and the clear walled shower cubical in the wall. The odd conical bordered hole in the floor made her frown though. She wondered if that was the toilet, and if so how it was going to work. Any further examination of the room was put on hold at the moment when she caught a glance at what had to be a mirror on one wall, and her reflection within.

11433222222222212112.content:
"Marinette is too skinny." Sabine Dupen Chang said with a scoff as she was leaning on her arm while looking at her daughter coming home from school. As Marinette ran up the stairs in a rush waving to her parents now, Sabine hated how she was always in a rush and seeming so neurotic. "Honey I don't think Marinette is really happy, she hardly eats nowadays and acts so odd." She said to her husband Tom Dupeng.

"Now dear we have been over this, just because she has been acting a bit more hyper and not eating as much does not mean there is anything wrong with her." The fat and wide male baker remarked to his chubby Chinese wife.

"Well she hardly sits down to dinner with us and doesn't eat the lunch's we pack, I just worry she used to be such a glutton when she was little is all." she sighed recalling how her daughter used to be such a chubby and cute child who loved to much on sweet treat's.

~~~

Later that night Sabine came up to her daughter's room and knocked on the door, having a tray of tarts, eclairs, and cookies. "Marinette sweetie I know your studying, but I thought we could sit and talk you see I-" She was cut off as she opened the door and saw her daughter missing, she was stunned at this and grumbled, taking a seat at Marinette's desk to wait for her. Sabine looking at all the constant pictures of Adrian, she honestly could not see what Marinette saw in this rail thing pretty boy. "I've met him and he seems nice, but I'll bit he is secretly stuck up and half in love with himself. She needs to find a sweet boy not so fixated on looks." She though looking at one of the pictures and crumpling it. "She started acting this way when she met him."

After about another hour Marinette climbed into her room from her window, the girls face growing pale as she saw her mother waiting for her. "Oh uh, mama hey." Her nervous chuckles evident as she then tripped falling flat on her face.

"Its past tea time, and right near dinner. You left no note and slipped out your window, do you have any idea how dangerous that is?" Now it made some sense why she was so skinny, it was so she could sneak around more easily. "I demand you tell me where you were young lady!"

"Mama, can we please not do this right now? I can't tell you its a secret." Marinette picked herself up and then bowed deeply her hands together.

"Your grounded, no phone, no TV, no going out, not until you tell me what is going on. I am very worried about all of this Marinette you didn't used to be so secretive and sneaky." she let out an aggravated sigh now, it was like her own daughter was living this secret life. "I just wanted us to sit and eat treats together like we used to before you became this secretive skinny rail."

"Y-y-you can't do that to me!" Marinette said with her jaw dropped. "I am a good kid mama, I can promise I am not in any danger." Of course that part was a lie, she was in danger almost every day as Ladybug.

"Does a good girl sneak out at night to do who knows what?" Sabine scoffing at the flimsy excuse. "You are asking me to trust you when honestly this child in front of me is not the Marinette I raised."

Marinette got red faced with anger and shouted. "MAMA, I LOVE YOU BUT GET OUT I DON'T NEED TO JUSTIFY WHY I GO OUT OR WHY I DON'T WANT YOUR FATTY TREATS!" the girl schreeched, she then gasped at seeing the heartbroken look on her mothers face as she ran out carrying her tray and crying.

~~~

After the door was slammed, Sabine ran downstairs to the bathroom and cried. Little did she know that in a secret location the villainious Hawkmoth heard her cries. "Awwww, is there anything more heartbreaking then a mother and child at odds? Such a sweet woman who merely wants her daughter to be well fed and happy. It is the perfect recipe for my akuma, now go and evilize her." He cackled while twirling his cane as a butterfly flew out the window.

~~~

The black butterfly floating in through the bathroom window it went into Sabine's serving platter as her eyes glowed with the akuma symbol. "Buddhamama, I am Hawkmoth you wish to feed all the starving children and make them happy and harkon back to when they were safe yes? Well I will bestow upon you the power to feed the world, all I ask is that after stuffing Ladybug and Catnoir you bring me their miraculus."

"Of course Hawk-Moth, let all my children grow fat, happy, and safe." She was laughing manically as her skin turned gold, her gut shooting out into a medicine ball like shape, her butt growing bigger like as if two watermelons were in her pants which turned into a long miko skirt and her shirt turning into a long white robe with gold flower designs and a drink jug tied around her waist. a beaded bra going over her now larger melon breasts while gaining a big, silly grin and drooling. "I shall feed all the children and make them my big babies, but first to get my own sidekick in Buddhagirl AKA Marinette she will never refuse my treats again!"

1143322222222222131331.content:
Buttercup was not having a great day today. After pulling a prank on Ms. Keane which involved pudding and a whole lot of silly string, she had to stay after school in order to clean up the mess. After two hours she finally got the job done, but now she had to fly home all by herself, and had to get ready for an earful from the Professor about it.

"Ugh, can this day suck any more?" Buttercup said, very annoyed.

Suddenly, she saw something in the corner of her eye, what looked like a princess wearing a blue dress reading an old-looking book. When she turned to look at it though, it was suddenly gone. Buttercup was not exactly fond of this person, remembering how often they had to save her from putting herself in danger due to trying to lure a prince, whom turned out to be a lazy, selfish loser. Not to mention her first impression involved her getting a kiss on the lips, which made her shudder every time she thought about it. Ever since then, Buttercup kept thinking she saw this princess in various other places. At school, in the park, the ice cream parlor, Buttercup just couldn't shake the feeling that she was being watched wherever she went. She couldn't see her anywhere right now though, so she thought she was safe.

She thought wrong. As soon as she started flying on home, she suddenly felt very sleepy. She tried to shake it off and go back on her way, but the feeling kept getting stronger. Soon she found herself lying on the sidewalk on her side, just about ready to fall asleep. Before losing consciousness, she thought she saw the bottom of a blue dress coming towards her...


ELSEWHERE...


Buttercup woke up in a dark room, having no idea where she was or how long she slept. She tried moving her arms, but found herself unable to, as they and her legs were tied to a chair she was sitting in by a strange, glowing rope. She tried to break free using her super-strength, but it was no good, somehow these strange ropes held.

"Argh, come on!" Buttercup said, getting frustrated.

"Good morning, my new Prince." said a voice from the dark that made Buttercup shudder. She knew well whom that voice belonged to, Princess Bluebelle. The light quickly turned on, and she saw the princess...
1143322222222222131331.title: Fattened by a princess? Yes please!

11433222222222221313311.content:
Buttercup looked upon the Princess in the blue dress, who had an evil smile on her face as she held a strange-looking tube in her hand.

"I hope my sleep spell didn't hurt you, my darling." Bluebelle said, coming towards Buttercup. "I'm still getting the hang of using magic."

"Alright you blonde bimbo, what do you want with me?" Buttercup said defiantly. Suddenly, she noticed her surroundings were unusually normal. She saw a bed in one corner of the room, a dresser on the side wall, and a mirror hanging above it. "Wait, are we in a bedroom?"

"Well, it turns out castles are prohibitively expensive in this realm, so I had to make do with this apartment." Bluebelle explained. "I do get free water, though."

"*sigh* Whatever. Look, why did you kidnap me? And why can't I escape from these ropes?"

"Well, to answer the latter, I conjured them and the chair up with some spells I learned from this book." Bluebelle said, pointing to a dusty-looking book that sat on her dresser. "Completely unbreakable, even for someone as strong as you. As for the former..."

Bluebelle put the tube down on the ground as she knelt in front of Buttercup. Then, to Buttercup's surprise, she planted a big kiss on Buttercup's lips, soon wrapping her arms around the young girl. Buttercup was grossed out and horrified by what was happening right now, she had been magically drugged and kidnapped, and now she was at the mercy of this perverted princess!

After about a minute of this, Bluebelle broke off the kiss, which left Buttercup gasping for air. Bluebelle then said "Ever since the day I met you, I've had you in my mind. I followed you wherever you went just so I could look upon you. And when I saw you defeat that giant monster by yourself the other day, I knew I had to make you my new prince. 1253322222222222211211.content:
In Cerulean City, it is a very dark and cold night. The moon is shining brightly through the clouds, the stars light up the otherwise pure black sky, and every one of the denizens, Human and Pokemon alike, was sleeping soundly through the harsh chill. Everyone...except for Misty. She was still awake, wide awake in fact, dressed in her iconic casual yellow shirt, denim shorts, and bright red suspenders as she lied in her bed. Once again, for too many times to count, she closes her eyes tight and covers herself with the bedding, only to uncover herself only a couple minutes later as sleep still continues to be elusive to her. The redhead had been suffering from an acute case of insomnia ever since she noticed that her skills in Pokemon combat have been...thrown off, so to say. At one point, she was unbeatable with a winning streak that brought her gym fame, but now...now she's lucky to win at least one battle a week.

"Good Arceus, why can't I just win for once!?" Misty cried to herself, exasperated beyond all imagination. She rolls over in her bed and covers her face with a pillow, but still, she is unable to shut out the thoughts of self-doubt, the memories of what she once was. Her mind was just too active to be at rest.

In the deafening quietness of her bedroom, a lone noise rang out. A growl, but not from a Pokemon, Misty made sure to put them in their Pokeballs before retiring to her quarters. No, it was her stomach that cried out, quite hungry despite the rather filling dinner she had eaten only a few hours ago. Unable to resist the calls of her belly, and hopeful that it may distract her mind for a bit, she hops out from the top of her bed.

Misty walked out of her bedroom and down the hallways towards the family kitchen. It was filled with snack foods and sweet foodstuffs after a trip to the local grocery store, so she would have no trouble locating something to quell her stomach. Sure enough, the redhead soon found a family-sized container of two dozen packaged cookies. Tired and not wanting to waste the energy on finding something else, she takes the box and walks back to her bedroom. Box in hand, she lies back down on her bed and haphazardly grabs a handful of cookies from the opening and pops them into her mouth. Interestingly, she has had this brand of cookie before, but only now, when she is feeling like absolute garbage, is she appreciating its taste. The flavor hasn't changed, but her mind's perception on the flavor has changed.

Misty's mind has changed its perception on many foods since her winning streak was replaced by a losing streak. Something her body, once handrails thin and now pleasantly chubby, could certainly attest for. You could hardly see the difference from far away, from a distance, but her eating habits were certainly starting to take a noticeable toll on her body. At the back of her mind, she understood that she had to be careful with the food she was eating as of late, but at the forefront of her mind was the drive to stop her stomach from being hungry. In only ten minutes, the box of cookies had been depleted, now digesting in Misty's slightly distended paunch. Unfortunately, it was not enough to sate her hunger pains, and with a heavy sigh she once again got off from her bed to get something to eat from the kitchen.

After making the trek back to the kitchen, Misty decides to peruse the contents of the freezer to see if she could microwave a meal. However, her eyes naturally gravitated to the gallon tub of chocolate moo moo ice cream. Still ignoring the voice at the back of her head saying that she needed to pay attention to what she ate, she cheerfully took it from its place in the freezer and grabbed a spoon with the intent of eating it all. This time she didn't bother to go back to her bedroom, too tired or too lazy to be bothered. Instead, she grabbed a stool and sat down at the counter.

Misty opened the gallon tub of ice cream and stuck her spoon deep within. Even before she had begun gaining weight, she had always been a big fan of the stuff, but now it was practically her favorite food and the one thing that took off the stress of her failures. Time passes and soon the whole gallon was gone and eaten, yet the water type Pokemon gym leader was nowhere near full. Nervously, she looked down at her once lean torso, having been changed to a rather soft sphere, pressing into the hem of her denim shorts, and they were already struggling because of the added pressure around her thighs and buttocks. She was confused about why she wasn't more worried about the damage she was doing to her body, and without even noticing it she got up and went for yet another gallon tub from the freezer.

Three more tubs went empty after the first one, and finally Misty felt that the hunger inside of her was satisfied for now. She erupts a rather unladylike belch of air and then proceeded to rub her taut and full stomach, bulging heavily into her shorts now. "Oh geez...Arceus my stomach. What is happening to me? I've never gotten so hungry before...not like...this..." She moaned in pain, closing her eyes and sleep finally came to her. She folded her pudgy arms over the countertop and rested her head inside as she finally managed to fall asleep.
1253322222222222211211.title: Misty

13113222222222222222111.content:
"She's gonna eat me!"

As soon as he heard Pumbaa holler, Simba jumped into action. He may not have been in the best shape but there's no way he was letting anybody eat his buddy or get away with waking him up from his afternoon nap. For a moment he thought the warthog might be messing around but then he heard a savage roar. For as long as he could remember, they never had any trouble with predators around the oasis. It was just the him, Timon, and Pumbaa living lazily and gorging on bugs. Surprisingly fattening bugs.

His boulder of a belly bounced against the ground and as he bounded towards his friend and where he heard the commotion. For his sake he hoped he wasn't too late. Through the upcoming brush he heard Pumba and Timon cry out in panic as something drew near. He called upon every ounce of strength he had and leaped through the bushes to pounce on his target.

He landed right on top of his target, and pinned them under the bulk of his weight. As a cub he was the one that got pinned but not anymore. Years had passed and he had grown massive even by lion standards. With a firey red mane, he snarled at his foe with pudgy cheeks and a set of double chins. His limbs press down beside his attacker's face and are bloated with blubber. His belly was as big as Pumba and trapped his target's lower body immobilizing them. All the while his doughy backside was raised up and unintentionally served as a deterrent for anyone behind him.

As he got a good look at this beast, he slowly realized that this was actually another lion. A lioness to be exact, one that was put off by his horrendous breath. As they glared at each other, their expressions softened and took a moment to better examine one another.

"Simba?" She asked, her angelic voice striking a chord in Simba that he never felt before. Timon and Pumba had ran off by this point, letting Simba deal with the other lion and wonder how she knew him. Did he know this lioness? After he moved in with the warthog and meerkat, he had suppressed most of his life before meeting the two to cope with his father's demise. Was she a friend he knew? Or was she sent to punish him for Mufasa's death?

Either way, Simba had worked up an appetite and had to decide whether to get off of her or to get rid of her before she told anyone else where he was. And maybe fill his belly too.
13113222222222222222111.title: A Slovenly Discovery

choices: Nala is surprised, but warms to Simba's changes
Nala is disgusted by how fat he's become.
131132222222222222221111.content:
The massive, obese lion slowly eased himself off the nimble, agile form of Nala, his ponderous belly releasing its pressure off her body. He wasn't sure what to say. He felt all manner of emotions rushing through him. Fear at what she might say, shame for running away, curiosity at what she was like now that she had grown up and some other feeling... happiness. At seeing his childhood friend in such a long time.
Nala climbed onto her feet, her beautiful eyes wide at the sight of her friend. Simba was as large as a hippo, his face puffy and doughy with a thick waddle, his belly thick and hanging between his legs as he pondered about, the fat wobbling upon his meaty calves as he circled her. Nala by comparison was lean and rake thin.

"Simba?" she asked. "Is that really you?"
He nodded, his multiple chins wobbling and shaking. He was suddenly very conscious of how big he was. He dwarfed her by a considerable margin, while with each breath that he took, he sent a gust of stinking air, reeking of rotten bugs and old food. Each gust made Nala flinch, wrinkling her nose.

"Hey, you know this broad?" his warthog companion suddenly spoke up, his large behind a little sore from where the lioness's claws had grazed it.
"Yes... me and Nala.... we... grew up together" the large lion nodded. "You've.... changed since I last saw you"

"So have you" she replied, running her eyes over his flabby, bloated figure, with its puffy, flabby ass, bulging gut, thick thighs and bloated moobs. He was larger than any lion she had ever seen. "You'e changed..... so much"
131132222222222222221111.title: The reunion

choices: Sure, Nala goes and eats with Simba
No! Nala tells Simba about Scar and urges him to come home
1311322222222222222211111.content:
It's no surprise that she was taken aback by his obese body but as the shock wore off it became less of a problem. She was just happy to find Simba alive, fat or not! She was tempted to nuzzle up to him but his smell kept her at bay. It was going to take her some time to adjust but she was more than willing to try. Besides, his musk wasn't that bad in her opinion. In fact, his dorky smile and pudgy body are actually kind of adorable the more she admired him. His blubber actually felt rather nice when he was on top.

"So what are you doing out here anyway?" Simba asked, derailing her train of thought. She shook the strange thoughts out of her head and realized that he was out of the loop. He had no idea what Scar was doing to their home.

"It's terrible, Simba. Ever since you left, food has been growing scarce. The herds have left, the watering holes have dried up, and even the plants have shriveled up and died. Its all because-"

"That sounds awful! You must be starving. No wonder you're so scrawny." She took slight offense at that remark and was going to finish but Simba cut her off. "We got plenty of food and water here. C'mon, let's go grab some grub and I can introduce you to the guys."

She looked toward the meerkat and warthog, the latter waving at her while the meerkat stood with his arms folded. Nala had so many questions to ask Simba and so much to tell him about Scar has been up to but it's also been days since she had a good meal or some thirst quenching water. They needed him back on the throne immediately but surely she could tell him after a quick bite. Right?
1311322222222222222211111.title: Happy To See a Long Lost Friend

13113222222222222222111111.content:
Nala decided to do just that. She nodded, before telling him. "Lead the way then"
Simba grinned, his puffy face wobbling with delight before he turned about and started to waddle his way back, his two companions in tow with him.
"So, who is this chick?" the meerket insisted as they headed along the dusty track, the fattened bodies of Simba and Pumba kicking up dust in their wake.
"She's a friend" the lion replied bashfully "From when I saw small"

"Oh no, I know that look" the meerkat sighed, laying back on Pumba's back. "This ain't gonna end well"
"She's nice. She just needs some food and water"
"She tried to eat me!" protested the warthog
"Like I said, she just needs food"

Nala followed on behind, listening in. These two critters sounded pretty close to Simba, perhaps they were the ones whom he'd been staying with for the long years that he'd been missing. They had so much that they needed to catch up...

They emerged out into a small, lush pool of shining water. Immediately, Nala was aware of how dry and cracked her mouth was. She suddenly ran forwards and plunged her head into the cool, refreshing water, drinking and drinking until her belly felt full and she'd consumed as much as she could.
"looks like ya needed that!" chuckled the warthog.
"I did" she gasped, panting as she lay there, cooling off. "I hadn't had a good drink in hours"

"You look starved" Simba said, gazing at her with those big, beautiful eyes of his. "How about we get you something to eat"
The fat lion padded over to a fallen log, his flesh rippling and wobbling, before he pushed at it with his nose and rolled it over. It revealed a mass of squirming, wriggling bugs and grubs, the tiny creatures crawling and curling over each other. The sight made Simba's mouth water, though as much as he wanted to fill his belly, he turned to Nala and motioned with his head. "There you go"
"You eat.... this?" she asked, padding forwards to examine the mass of bugs.
13113222222222222222111111.title: Sure, Nala goes and eats with Simba

choices: Nala stays with Timon and Pumba
131132222222222222221111111.content:
"You bet! It's a little gross at first but you learn to love it." Simba insisted. Spotting a juicy, plump worm, Simba grabbed it with his teeth and yanked it out of the ground. It wriggled and flopped hanging out of his maw as Simba turned to offer it to Nala. The lioness grimaced at the insect but realized that there was no turning it down. Besides, she hadn't eaten in days and at this point she was desperate. Nala wrapped her lips around the other end and slurped it up like spaghetti.

She shuddered as it fell into her stomach and smacked her lips. It was over and done with....and she liked it. The taste was fresh on her tongue and not a particularly bad one. "Slimy...."

"Yet satisfying?" Simba finished.

She nodded and wondered if that was a fluke. Simba gave her a nod encouraging her to try some more and she hesitantly lowered her head to catch a blue beetle with her teeth. It flailed about on her tongue making it hard to swallow whole but it came to a stop when she bit down and crunched it. The juices she tasted were strangely tantalizing as they flowed down her throat. Simba watched her expression shift as she found herself enjoying the sensation. Her stomach rumbled and she stopped but only to let loose a small UUURRRPP!

From there, she carefully chomped on bug after bug testing to see how they varied. Simba stuffed his maw with creepy crawlies standing next to her. Acting like a gentleman, he pushed the best grubs closer to her which she was astonished to find delicious. Pumba smiled watching as the cub he raised dined with such a lovely lioness, who by now was mixing and matching different combinations of bugs. She's so captivated that she didn't even notice when Simba released a bellowing BWWEEEERRRRFFFFFFTTYT from his tailhole. Its hard for her to believe that such tiny insects could pack so much flavor.

By the time they had cleaned out the bottom of the log, Nala had developed a craving for bugs though. Not as strong as Simba or his caretaker's but it was a start. She burped again, illiciting a chuckle from Simba. "See? That wasn't so bad."

"Alright, maybe they weren't the worst. They aren't very filling though."

"Not very filling!?" Timon shouted. "Can you believe the nerve of this chick? We get her the best log and she's not satisfied." She didn't intend to act ungrateful, but as a lion she needed more to eat than Timon did. Her stomach did look fuller but there was plenty of room for more. Actually, after getting some food Nala was eager to continue filling her belly. With no bugs around, the most appetizing things around are Timon and Pumba.

"Take it easy, there's plenty more grub hiding around. They're pretty easy to find when you know where to look. Want to come look for some with me?" Nala turned to her childhood friend and felt awful for thinking about eating his foster family. Even if the pig did look delicious. Yet the more time she spent with Simba, the stranger she felt about the fat cat. She's been getting butterflies in her stomach, figuratively and literally.
131132222222222222221111111.title: Nala's First Bite

13113222222222222222121221.content:
One day while hunting for food in the Pride Lands, Nala was currently searching for a special brand of food to give for her mate, Simba. Although the Pride Lands was inhabited by numerous different species of animals and insects, epitomizing the abundance of life; Nala was having a bit of trouble looking for a specific grub.

Simba would mention this long caterpillar-like bug that he, Timon and Pumbaa had eaten long ago; describing how sweet, gooey and filling it was. Even making Nala somewhat jealous from the juicy description she received from him, as the lioness has her fair share of bug eating.

Checking every rock, tree, and hole in the Savannah, Nala was still having trouble looking for an insect with that description.

“Maybe I should give up, I probably won’t find it here-“ Nala muttered to herself before she discovered something glowing deep within the rather old looking tree.

Poking her head through the open hole, she discovered a thick long white bug, though it was strangely decorated with blue and green smears across its body. Regardless, this bug did look like it matched Simba’s description, already picturing how pleased he’ll look once she brings it to him.

As she pushed her head deeper into the hole to collect the bug with her mouth, Nala accidentally bit too hard onto the bug with her teeth, quickly swallowing the bitten half down her mouth.

“Oh no…” she groaned in her mind.
13113222222222222222121221.title: Nala, Queen of Lions and Insects

131132222222222222221212211.content:
Nala coughed and hacked as if she had a hairball but alas she wasn't able to upchuck the bug chunk. All her efforts were for naught and now she had a vile taste in her mouth. Her stomach rumbled and she was reminded that until now she hadn't eaten anything all day. Hunting was sure to perk her up and take her mind off her of her failure.

The queen prowled the Pride Lands looking to quench her hunger but had some trouble piecing together what she wanted. There were plenty of creatures grazing yet she found herself craving something strange. She couldn't figure out what it was but she knew the taste. It wasn't fruit or prey, that was for sure. She realized this when she stopped a group of lionesses hauling back a zebra carcass to Pride Rock. They let the queen have the first taste as she tore into the fresh, succulent meat. It was tasty but not she desired. Still it wasn't until she devoured half of the kill before she stopped and resumed her quest, her belly full yet wanting more.

She then tried her luck biting into some ripe melons and mangos that littered the ground beneath the trees a couple of monkeys were playing in . The juices did please her palette but it wasn't what she was looking for. She had eight mangos and three coconuts, rind and all, before the lioness continued her search as her middle stretched out. If she wasn't the queen, her subjects might have teased her for her pudgy midsection.

Nala was about to give up when she finally found what it was she craved. It was something Simba introduced to her that surprised her with it's taste. What she hungered for was...
131132222222222222221212211.title: Nala tries coughing it back out but she stangel...

choices: Nala's body started to expand and gain bee features
Nala's body started to expand, mostly in her ass.
1311322222222222222212122111.content:
Honey.

Nala didn’t know why but she suddenly had a big craving for honey.

Deliciously golden honey…

Licking her chops as she remembered how tasty it was, the lioness soon heard a familiar sound in the distance. Following where that sound was coming from, Nala soon discovered some bees buzzing happily at some flowers.

“If there are some bees here, then where’s the hive?” she said to herself before locating the exact spot where the bees were coming and going from.

She saw a big hive submerged into a wall, where many bees were crawling all over, rushing in and out as they pleased.

“Fresh bees to go along with my fresh honey,” Nala smirked, licking her mouth once again.

Making her way towards the beehive entrance, Nala immediately shoved her paw deep inside and scooped out a big heap of sticky honey, honeycombs and any unfortunate bees that were sticking onto the surface out of the hole; quickly shoving them into her hungry mouth.

Nala couldn’t help but moan loudly while she chewed on her food, enjoying every part of it. The taste of her collected prize giving her taste buds lovely pleasurable experience. As she finished her first scoop, she tried again before getting attacked by some angry bees. Stinging a first, Nala simply ignored the pain and continued to stuff her face with hungry. Even eating some of the attacking forces that were trying to prevent her.

But as she continued to consume her honey cuisine…
1311322222222222222212122111.title: Honey from a Bee hive?

choices: Nala senses a fresh carcass and seeks it out
1311322222222222222212122112.content:
An anthill larger than any she had seen before with dozens if not hundreds of worker ants running up and down the slope carrying crumbs and grains inside. The first time she tried the little guys they were spicier than she imagined and tickled her tongue but they weren't as bad as she thought. Now all of a sudden she had a strange craving for them. Rather than question it, she reasons that maybe if she licked up a few it would be enough and she could go back to her duties.

It was simple enough, just lower her head and lick up some of the ants from the line, gulp them down, and get out of there. Except one slurp wasn't enough. She ran her tongue along another trail of ants, chewed them up, and swallowed again. Still had that kick she enjoyed but not enough to satisfy. So she scooped a couple lines together and sent them down with the rest, cleaning any still clinging to her fur. Again, not enough. She coughed up some dust and resorted to drastic measures.

So she went up to the anthill itself and wrapped her lips around the top and started sucking like it was a big straw and got a good mouthful of the buggers and a couple of berries they were carrying along with it. Her belly soon filled with the writhing insects and digesting as they sparked her taste buds. The little tunnelers tried to escape but her suction was too much.

Just as she was starting to run out, she swiped and smashed the anthill in two and started biting out the frenzing insects as she struggled to get her fix. Unaware that she was starting to fill out from eating hundreds of ants or that her body was subtly changing and replicating her prey. Her senses heightened and while swiping at the bugs her paws managed to knock up more dirt than she normally could when trying. Once she had cleaned out the hive, she was still hungry even though it was the equivalent of eating five mangos. That's when...
1311322222222222222212122112.title: Ants Went Marching Down Her Throat

13231112121.content:
Shrek may not love it, but Fiona enjoyed coming home to Far, Far Away to visit her family even if it meant leaving Shrek and the kids behind. She didn't dwell on that last part and instead focused on her trip to FFA. With Arthur still in charge, she didn't have to worry about any royal duties. All she had to do was relax and indulge the only way an ogre could: with lots of fancy, fattening food and expensive clothes.

Her carriage passed through the shopping district of Far Far Away. She stuck her head out the window while in the midst of chewing on a turkey leg from the local drive-thru. She hadn't even reached the castle and already her dress had sauce dribbled on it. Knowing her mom and cousin they would look past it and all her ogrely tendencies. At least, that's what she hoped.

She crudely burped and finished her turkey, grabbing another from her takeout box, while she eyed the shops and wondered if she should get a new dress before reaching the castle. Maybe some underwear too, since she was going commando at the moment and staining her seat with sweat from her doughy, pumpkin-sized buns. Plus she was still hungry and could go for seconds. And thirds. And fourths. Basically she could go for more food and wasn't embarrassed to pig out in public if needed. In fact, she let one rip as they passed another carriage and they nearly mistook her flatulence for a foghorn.

What should she do?
13231112121.title: She acts like a royal pig in Far Far Away.

choices: Fiona gets pampered back at the castle.

1323111212221.content:
The dragonflies were abuzz as Fiona waded through the muck hunting for tonight's dinner. Shrek was off with Donkey which meant it was up to her to wrangle up some grub for later. Figuratively and literally. She had a pale green top on along with a tightly wrapped skirt that showed off her thick, lime green thighs. She carried a bucket along with her to haul her catch, looking for some nice trout or turtles for her next meal. It's tiring work but when well prepared, the food is worth the effort.

Still there were times she envied the critters that roamed the swamps. Not to say that she didn't enjoy her life, but it would be nice and faster to swim through the water like a bass or slink along her belly like a snake. Ogre life was fun but it had taken her toll on her figure making it tough to get around with ease. Though she did like her muffin top and the way Shrek teased her by rubbing it.

While she's lost in thought, she grabbed something unusual and secretly magical that would soom end up in her belly. What is it?

info.brief_description: Now I'm doing everything animated! Choose anyone and make them get big and fat!
info.description: It's been pointed out to me once or twice that my focus was too limited, and there's still some truth to that statement. As such, I've now created my most ambitious project to date: now you can choose anyone from any show, anime, or perhaps even animated movie (I do think claymation stuff like Coraline could use more WG material), and make them as big as you want with no rules or restrictions. The only rule is to have fun!
